# Remaining
* RSwag for documentation
* Unit tests for images controller
* Devise is pretty good for security, sadly the rails 7 promise of autogenerated security does not apply to API only services like this one.

The app runs, ingests data, and is a restful API. </br>
It's mostly script generated with a minimal code delta. </br>
It isn't ready for production. </br>
I've never made a production-ready app in 6 hours and neither has anyone else.
